entry.tran: （盛行于西班牙、葡萄牙和拉丁美洲地区的）斗牛表演
entry.def: A bullfight is a public entertainment in which people fight and kill bulls. Bullfights take place in Spain, Portugal, and Latin America.

means.word_mean: 1. a Spanish or Portuguese or Latin American spectacle; a matador baits and (usually) kills a bull in an arena before many spectators
